t=input()
for i in range(0,t):
    n=input();
    array1=raw_input().split()
    array2=raw_input().split()
    for j in range(0,n):
        array1[j]=int(array1[j])
        array2[j]=int(array2[j])
    array1.sort()
    array2.sort()
    j=0
    k=0
    count=0
    while(j<n and k<n):
        if array1[j]<=array2[k]:
          count=count+1
          j=j+1
          k=k+1
        else:
            k=k+1
    print count
